org.xbib.elasticsearch.index.analysis.skos
Class SKOSLabelFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.lucene.util.AttributeSource
      org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenStream
          org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenFilter
              org.xbib.elasticsearch.index.analysis.skos.AbstractSKOSFilter
                  org.xbib.elasticsearch.index.analysis.skos.SKOSLabelFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable
public final class SKOSLabelFilter
extends AbstractSKOSFilter

A Lucene TokenFilter that supports label-based term expansion as described in https://code. google.com/p/lucene-skos/wiki/UseCases#UC2:_Label-based_term_expansion. It takes labels (String values) as input and searches a given SKOS vocabulary for matching concepts (based on their prefLabels). If a match is found, it adds the concept's labels to the output token stream.

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

SKOSLabelFilter

public SKOSLabelFilter(org.apache.lucene.analysis.TokenStream input,
                       SKOSEngine skosEngine,
                       org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer,
                       int bufferSize,
                       SKOSTypeAttribute.SKOSType... types)
Constructor for multi-term expansion support. Takes an input token stream, the SKOS engine, and an integer indicating the maximum token length of the preferred labels in the SKOS vocabulary.

Parameters:
input - the consumed token stream
skosEngine - the skos expansion engine
bufferSize - the length of the longest pref-label to consider (needed for mult-term expansion)
types - the skos types to expand to
